parameters.name: AcceptLanguage
parameters.description:
The language of the response. Valid values:

*   zh: Chinese
*   en: English

parameters.name: ClusterName
parameters.description: The name of the Nacos instance.

parameters.name: Enabled
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to disable this service. Valid values:

*   `true`: yes.
*   `false`: no.

parameters.name: Ephemeral
parameters.description:
Specifies whether the node is a non-persistent node. Valid values:

*   `true`: yes.
*   `false`: no.

parameters.name: Ip
parameters.description: The IP address of the Nacos instance.

parameters.name: Port
parameters.description: The port number of the Nacos instance.

parameters.name: Weight
parameters.description: The weight. Valid values: 0 to 10000. The value must be an integer. A larger value indicates a higher frequency at which the instance is accessed.
